column1: The Pit Room////This place was exceptional in all aspects. We got the brisket
column3: and turkey which were all amazing. As our sides we got potato salad and pork skins. These were both excellent options. The pork skins come with hot sauce which is a great pairing. This was our favorite BBQ joint in Houston of all of the ones that made the Texas monthly top 50. Very short line that goes very fast.
